Title: My Journal Tracker - a DayOne Snapshot Client for Microsoft Windows
Description: write your DayOne journal (a iOS and Mac OSX journal app) on your Windows PC. Make nice snapshots and view your journal on your iPad.
HomeWiki:
My Journal Tracker
write your DayOne journal (a iOS and Mac OSX journal app) on your Windows PC. Make nice snapshots and view your journal on your iPad.


This is a simple windows based client for enter a journal for the iOS and Mac OSX DayOne Application via DropBox.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
